code: import React from"react";i;import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ShowPlants1(){var history=useNavigate();function handleClick(){history('/plantprofile');}function checkSeller(){history('/sellerprofile');}function cart(){history('/cart');}var plants=[{name:"Dragon Plant",vendor:"Maria Florista",price:20,imageUrl:plant1},{name:"Monstera",vendor:"Estufas Martins",imageUrl:plant2}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{flex:1,border:'5px solid #6B8E23'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:"grid",gridTemplateColumns:"repeat(4, 1fr)",gap:"1rem"},children:plants.map(function(plant,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{border:"1px solid #ccc",padding:"1rem"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:plant.imageUrl,alt:plant.name,style:{width:"50%",height:"50%",objectFit:"cover",marginBottom:"0.5rem"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontWeight:"bold"},children:plant.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontStyle:"italic"},children:["Vendedido por: ",plant.vendor]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontStyle:"italic"},children:["Pre\xE7o: ",plant.price," \u20AC"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{marginRight:'10px',backgroundColor:'#6B8E23',color:'white',padding:'5px 20px',fontSize:'16px',borderRadius:'5px',border:'none',cursor:'pointer'},onClick:handleClick,children:"Visit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{marignLeft:'10px',backgroundColor:'#6B8E23',color:'white',padding:'5px 20px',fontSize:'16px',borderRadius:'5px',border:'none',cursor:'pointer'},onClick:cart,children:"Add to cart"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{marignLeft:'10px',backgroundColor:'#6B8E23',color:'white',padding:'5px 20px',fontSize:'16px',borderRadius:'5px',border:'none',cursor:'pointer',marginTop:'5px'},onClick:checkSeller,children:"Visit seller"})})]},index);})})});}export default ShowPlants1;
